Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:



The dark Archbishop saw the golden sand and smiled, his base coming into 
view.  He landed several feet from the shield, speaking some inaudible words 
into a comm. unit in his wrist, the shields dropping momentarily allowing the 
three Brotherhood members to walk through and enter the ship and then closing.

---

Reaching the lab, Vehement pressed a few commands and a secret panel opened, 
a blank, old looking scroll inside.  With his free hand, the other holding 
the black sphere AKA "The Key", he lifted the scroll, walking over to an 
empty table and setting it down.

He held the sphere several inches from the blank ancient scroll, soon a mix 
of ancient Cybertronian and two languages known only to Vehement appeared, 
the Archbishop reading the rather long list that was there.

"Put base on red alert.  If something moves, open fire completely.  No one 
comes in, no one goes." he ordered his minions, deactivating the transmission 
before they could respond.  So far it was the usual headline for all 
Brotherhood-related texts.  But he had to study it carefully.  It was the 
next piece of the puzzle.
